A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Iconic\, epic\, a journey of destruction and hope. Rian Johnson directed a movie full of surprises and great plot twists\, this is how The Last Jedi gets the Star Wars franchise out the confort zone\, it's great how deep and evolve this characters goes\, it's amazing how this movie is build to provide endless possibilities to the future. This is definitely one of the best movies of the year. (5/5)
